title: Interpretation of a dream about swearing by the Qur’an in a dream

Interpretation of the dream in which I swear by the Qur’an in a dream can express the truth, and God knows the unseen, because Seeing an oath in the Qur’an may indicate testimony regarding certain matters, and God knows the unseen. If a married woman sees in a dream that two oaths are in court, this may be evidence of testimony of faith, and God knows best. If the dreamer sees an oath in the Qur’an in front of someone he knows, he may resort to searching for The truth, and God is Most High and Most Knowing.Interpretation of dreams I swear to God in a dreamInterpretation of a dream in which I swear to God in a dream can indicate deception and God knows the unseenBecause seeing an oath in a dream can be a sign of deception on both sides, and God knows the unseenWhen you see a vow in a dream, it can It is a sign of humiliation, and God knows the unseen. title: Interpretation of a dream about the key to the door of Ibn Sirin

preview.html: The interpretation of a dream about a door key is one of the important visions that indicate many good things, especially in alleviating crises and other various interpretations, as the key is one of the important things in the life of every person who cannot do without it, as it is used to lock and unlock doors, locks and private matters. The other. So that it is not lost or stolen, we will show you a series of interpretations of displaying a door key. Interpretation of a dream of a door keySeeing a key in a dream can symbolize annoying people who want to know everything big and small. Seeing a key in a dream can indicate open minds that want to Plan carefully and be wise and smart in implementation. Dreaming about keys in a dream symbolizes victory over enemies and achieving the goals that a person seeks. If one dreams that he finds a key after losing it for a long time, this indicates the fulfillment of a desire that he has been waiting for for many years. The vision The key in a dream indicates the door that God will open in the person of the monarch and through it he will obtain goodness and abundance. Interpretation of a dream about a door key by Ibn SirinInterpretation of a dream about a door key in a dream can indicate knowledge, sustenance, help, comfort, starting a new life, or spying on people. But if one sees many keys in his hands, then this is a sign of the key to heaven, wealth, or inheritance. Seeing a wooden key is a sign of hypocrisy. If one sees in a dream that he received a key, then a tiger is evidence that he will enjoy wealth and many good things. If the dreamer sees the key in a dream and opens an iron door, this indicates his marriage to a woman whom he ran far behind until he reached her. If someone sees the key after losing it in a dream, this indicates the fulfillment of a desire. As for losing the key in a dream, it indicates On the loss of money, profession, or job. The dream interpretation website on the Internet is a site specialized in interpreting dreams in the Arab world. Just write. The dream interpretation website on the Internet. Search on Google and get the correct interpretations. Interpretation of a dream about a door key for a single woman. If an unmarried girl sees in her dream that she takes... A key, then she will get married soon and start a new life. But if she sees an iron key in her dream, this is a sign of her marriage to a young man who will be a support and help in her life. When an unmarried woman sees a golden key in her dream, this indicates her marriage to a very rich man. If You gave a key to someone you know in a dream and he was happy, it means that he will live a life full of joy, food, and pleasure. Seeing a key in general in an unmarried girl’s dream is a sign of her kindness, good circumstances, and the appearance of some good changes in her life. And if you see him opening the door with a key, this is evidence of... That he has a bright future ahead of him. Interpretation of a dream about a door key for a married woman: If a married woman sees in a dream that she has found a key, this means that she will get something new and it could be a house or a car. But if she sees that

title: Interpretation of seeing cabbage in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing cabbage in a dream by Ibn Sirin, Al-Nabulsi, Ibn Shaheen, Ibn Kathir and Imam Al-Sadiq. What is the interpretation of seeing cabbage in a dream for a single girl: Seeing cabbage in a dream for a single girl is a sign that she keeps her secrets and keeps them away from her family and loved ones. A single girl sees cabbage in a dream, indicating her strong personality, creating many relationships and her exceptional intelligence. Seeing cabbage for a single woman in a dream indicates a love of money and fame or indicates extreme greed and corrupt morals. See also: Interpretation of seeing white cabbage in a dream What is the interpretation of seeing cabbage in a dream for a married woman: A married woman sees cabbage in a dream, a sign that brings her good and a lot of sustenance after a long journey of struggle. Seeing a married woman buying green cabbage in a dream is an indication of the fulfillment of desires and ambitions, such as a new job or gaining abundant money. Seeing a married woman cooking cabbage in a dream. One of the good visions is that the patient recovers from illness and enjoys good health. Seeing cabbage planting in a dream is an indication of the dreamer's dreams coming true and a happy pregnancy. Seeing a married woman of cabbage in a dream is a sign of solving problems and a great promotion In her work, or indicates her husband's cruelty and neglect. Seeing cabbage cooking in a dream is a sign of blessing in health, money and children. See also: Interpretation of seeing stuffed vegetables in a dream What is the interpretation of a pregnant woman who sees cabbage in a dream: Seeing a pregnant cabbage in a dream is a sign that opens the doors of livelihood for her and brings her abundant goodness. Seeing cabbage in a pregnant woman's dream is an indication that she has a righteous son, as it announces that he has overcome the problems of childbirth and enjoys better health. What is the interpretation of a young man who sees green cabbage in a dream: A young man sees green cabbage in a dream, indicating the dreamer's great successes and creating great wealth through his trade. Seeing eating green cabbage in a young man's dream is one of his best visions because it indicates bringing blessings and goodness. See also: Interpretation of seeing a bag of rice in a dream What is the interpretation of seeing cabbage growing in a dream: Seeing cabbage seeds in a dream is an indication of good children and proper education for them. Seeing cabbage in a dream is a sign of achieving things that were difficult to achieve, God's response to the dreamer's prayers, and the arrival of goodness and livelihood to him. What is the interpretation of seeing a dead person giving cabbage in a dream: Seeing a dream that you are giving cabbage to a dead person Bad connotations such as feeling sad and depressed or losing a loved one. What is the interpretation of a divorced woman who sees cabbage in a dream: Seeing in a dream a divorced woman suffering from major health problems from cabbage indicates the collapse of all worries and a quick recovery. Seeing a divorced woman of cabbage seeds in a dream is a sample of her fatigue and great struggle in raising her children and their good conditions and their great excellence in their studies. See also: Interpretation of seeing pieces of rice in a dream What is the interpretation of seeing cabbage in a dream according to Ibn Sirin: Seeing cabbage in a dream according to Ibn Sirin is a sign of the blessing of money and creating a great fortune after a great journey and struggle. Dreaming of eating cabbage

title: Interpretation of a gun in a dream by Fahd Al-Osaimi

preview.html: We present to you, dear reader, the features of vision, the interpretation of a gun in a dream, Fahd Al-Osaimi in good and evil. The science of dreams is a vast sea of ​​meanings and connotations that do not correspond to ideas, and it is a meaning introduced by dream interpretation scholars based on observations of reality and taking these symbols from dreams and arranging them according to events from reality and what people have experienced. In the past. As stated in the story of our master Joseph, peace be upon him, the dream has meanings, connotations, and symbols that carry many meanings. To see the gun in our article through the encyclopedia, follow us. Interpretation of a gun in a dream Fahd Al-Osaimi Some believe that seeing a gun indicates power, and others may believe that seeing a gun means evil. The respected scholar Fahd Al-Osaimi interpreted seeing a shot from a gun in the dreamer’s dream as an indication: It He is miserable in his life and does not want to continue in his current circumstances, and desires renewal and change, and God is the highest and greatest. He knows better. The vision of shooting from the gun carried by the dreamer is actually interpreted as; He feels anxious and stressed about what is coming in his life, and he also feels insecure, and only God knows the unseen. Seeing a gun in a dream is never a good sign. Seeing a weapon in a dream indicates the difficulties and obstacles that the dreamer faces in reality, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. Here we summarize what was said about the interpretation of seeing a gun in a dream as one of the visions that does not bode well because it indicates tension, anxiety and resentment that have become the scourge of societies. Interpretation of Fahd Al-Osaimi seeing a single woman in a dream carrying a gun. An unmarried woman who sees a gun in a dream is not considered a good sign. A single woman’s vision of a gun indicates separation from her fiancé or lover, and God alone is supreme and most knowledgeable. Seeing an unmarried woman in a dream, according to Fahd Al-Osaimi, symbolizes: confronting the challenges that hinder her in her life, but by God’s command and ability, worry and distress will disappear, and sadness and God will be revealed. Only the world of the unseen.Interpretation of carrying a gun in a dream for a single woman. The single girl wakes up from her sleep searching for the meanings and connotations of her vision carrying a gun in her dream. So what about the interpretations that came when seeing a gun in a dream for a single woman? Seeing yourself carrying a gun in a single woman’s dream indicates. The Almighty God grants her victory and power, and in her life she enjoys a high status and elevation by His command, and the Lord is Most High and Most Knowing. Seeing him holding a gun in the hand of an unmarried woman is one of the praiseworthy visions that bodes well, as there is glorification, wealth, and elevation to the position that he has always desired in reality. Only the Lord knows. The unseen. Seeing an unmarried girl receiving the gift of a gun in a dream means that she will be happily on the verge of marrying the person she has always dreamed of in reality, as she will marry a man who enjoys a distinguished position and a high position, and the Lord alone is Most High and Knows. Stealing a gun in dreams. Some people have a gun in A dream is a source of power, authority and prestige, but what about losing a gun in a dream and having it stolen? Is it a vision worthy of praise or is it something that is priceless?

title: Interpretation of seeing a house drowning in water in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a house drowning in water in a dream or vision, water is the lifeblood of a person and its excess can cause disasters such as floods and seeing a house or house sinking in water can indicate good and material gains and can indicate disasters and adversities if they cause In drowning people or preventing them from moving, we will explain that in detail. The interpretation of seeing a house submerged in water in this article in the dream of an unmarried man or young man, as well as for married women, pregnant women, divorcees, and widows. Providing the interpretation of seeing the autumn season for some imams such as Imam Ibn Sirin, Imam al-Sadiq, and other interpreters of the era. Hadith, so follow us on the Vision website. What is Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing a house drowning in water in a dream? I saw myself drowning in water and then was saved. It indicates the fulfillment of a long-awaited desire. Seeing a house drowning It indicates a calamity or disaster in the dreamer’s life. Seeing a house sinking in Water and people drowning, which indicates the seriousness of the dangers to which the dreamer is exposed, and the problems and disputes that may lead to hostility and strife. Seeing someone drowning and unable to survive announces repentance for sins. Seeing water running in the yard indicates goodness and blessings. What is the interpretation of a dream about a house being flooded with water for a pregnant woman? For a pregnant woman, the apartment is sinking. It indicates her imminent birth. Seeing the house filled with water in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates a lot of good and abundant money. Seeing the house and people sinking indicates problems with pregnancy and childbirth. What is the interpretation of a dream about a house being flooded with sea water? Seeing the house drowning in sea water indicates that I hear good news and many good things about the people of this house. Seeing an unmarried young man drowning in black water indicates his marriage to a bad girl. Seeing a house drowning until it fills the house and prevents the people of the house from moving indicates marital or family problems and many adversities and obstacles. What is the interpretation of a dream? Flooding the house with water for a single woman? If a girl sees that she drowned and cannot survive, it indicates their failure in worship and committing a sin. If a girl sees that she is drowning, she can survive, it indicates finding a solution to her problems and dispelling her worries and sorrows. If the girl sees her brother drowning, it is a sign It indicates that he will get married soon, and it may indicate that he has no support in life. Seeing a drowning girl denotes a lot of knowledge and learning. What is the interpretation of a dream about a house being flooded with water? Seeing a married woman drowning denotes her negligence towards her domestic and marital duties. Seeing a house drowning in water indicates a lot of Money and good things. Seeing a house sinking and water descending on the steps of the house and through the windows indicates the many problems and experiences that the dreamer suffers from. What is the interpretation of a dream about drowning the earth in water? Seeing a person drowning in mud indicates their anxiety and distress. Seeing water in a man’s dream indicates the number A large number of male and female offspring and offspring. Whoever sees that the earth has sunk and drowned him up to his head, it indicates many trials and tribulations that he will face. We are happy to see the reception of Ahla

title: A young girl in a dream for an unmarried woman

preview.html: A child in a dream indicates abundant livelihood, the fulfillment of wishes, the arrival of good news, and seeing a female infant is better than a male, as stated in dream interpretation books. Interpretation of seeing a young girl in a dream about a single girl. Seeing a young girl in a dream for an unmarried woman means wealth, happiness, and the arrival of goodness in life. Her life. Anyone who sees a child smiling at her in a dream is a sign of good luck. If an unmarried girl dreams that she has given birth to a baby girl, this means that her deferred dreams are close to being fulfilled, God willing. Seeing the birth of a little girl in a dream indicates the presence of an unmarried woman. The viewer feels psychological comfort and calm after a period full of fatigue and suffering. It has also been said that giving birth to a girl in a dream heralds goodness and a new beginning, and God knows best. When a woman sees in her sleep as if she is hugging a little girl, this expresses a feeling of security and stability after a period of distress and crises, and God knows best. See also: Interpretation of dreams of someone who gave me a child. Interpretation of seeing a little girl in a dream for a married woman. This vision is considered one of the good visions that carry many omens for a married woman. We will learn about its interpretation in the following lines: When a married woman sees a sleeping child, she looks at her. This means that good intentions It will bring abundant sustenance to her, her family, and her husband. It has also been said that a baby girl in a single woman’s dream is a sign of the approaching pregnancy. Seeing the birth of a girl in a dream. For the stability of the dreamer’s marital relationship and for her to enjoy tenderness, mercy, and good treatment from her husband and children. Imam Ibn Sirin says that the baby girl in A dream in which she is late in giving birth. God Almighty gives good news that she will bear a child. If the dreamer is suffering in her life from many problems and lack of money. This dream assures her that the future is better and that her sadness and tension will end, God willing. Interpretation of seeing a young girl in a dream for a man and its meaning: seeing a woman in a dream A man in general, whether it is a child, a girl, or a woman, expresses the world’s wealth and his inclination toward the dreamer, and this is what we explain in the following points: When a man sees a little girl smiling at him in his sleep, it is one of the most beautiful visions. It represents happiness and abundance of money, and he must be very optimistic. Because the next is better. The birth of a little girl in a married man’s dream is a sign of good luck. The dreamer enjoys a life full of stability and peace with his partner. If a man sees in a dream that his wife is giving birth to a girl. It is a sign of coming out of the dark tunnel and starting over, and it is also said that A sign of his wife’s pregnancy. Seeing a pregnant baby girl in a man’s dream means that he will hear good news. Read also: Interpretation of seeing a beautiful baby girl in a dream by Ibn Sirin. The meaning of seeing a baby girl in a pregnant woman’s dream and its interpretation. Seeing a pregnant baby girl in a dream makes her feel reassured and longs to see her fetus and embrace it, but what about Interpretation of this dream? We will answer this question as follows: Dreaming of a little girl in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates a lot of thinking about the fetus. Seeing the birth of a girl in a pregnant woman’s dream. However, God Almighty will give her a beautiful boy, and that too if she sees a dream in the future.

title: Interpretation of a dream about crumples in a dream for a single woman, for a married woman, for a pregnant woman

preview.html: The meaning of the Tsalabatin that enters the house, whether white, black, or colored, in reality in the morning at Imam Al-Sadiq. Seeing a collapsed, shrunken person in a dream is a praiseworthy dream. If one sees in a dream that the Tsalapetino is speaking to him, then this is evidence of the character of that person he sees and that he is approaching God Almighty through worship and prayer. The hoopoe is a symbol of the bird in the dream. The Tsalapetino in the vision is a man with insight in his work, a writer or critic who deals with the most subtle questions and sciences. In terms of details, but he has little faith and his praise is bad because he smells bad. The threatening voice shows that you hear good tidings and assurances. A shout in one dream. A good and honest person, and it can sometimes symbolize a teacher or professor, who is good in all situations and situations. If it falls on her shoulder, this indicates Good luck, and if the girl sees it on her hand, this indicates her livelihood, money, or something like that. In visions, the wren deserves praise for looking out the window or window, and it also deserves praise for hearing its voice and realizing its identity or identity, meaning that the viewer distinguishes it from other types of birds. He does not believe that it is anything but collapsed, and generally in the interpretation it shows luck and protection. The hoopoe in a married woman’s dream is a good son or a good and loyal husband, and in dreams it is a good sign for whomever she sees flying, soaring, or entering her house and eating from it. And if the married woman catches it, it will reach her height and good fortune, It is not permissible for her to slaughter it, cook it, or eat its meat. As for its wings in a dream, it shows money, as well as its eggs. A hoopoe in a pregnant woman’s dream often indicates a male child, and it is a sign of genius and success and is a very positive symbol. It is praiseworthy in visions for a curly one to enter a pregnant woman’s house, because in this case it may foretell something desirable. A shqata in a man’s dream. It symbolizes his dignity, and in the interpretation it indicates intelligence, genius, and wisdom. A white tsalapetino also indicates the acceptance of an order that is good or a blessing, and is not deserved. Dreaming of being caught or put in a cage, as this may express a deteriorating financial situation or living conditions. A jackal can be a symbol of removing problems and fears if a man sees him entering the house or room, landing on the roof of the house or flying around. It is permissible to announce the marriage of a single person or the pregnancy of a married man to a married man. Interpretation of two cascades in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of seeing crumples in a dream for a single woman. If an unmarried girl sees in a dream that a curly man is talking to her, this is evidence of this girl’s purity and chastity and that she is close to God Almighty. Interpretation of seeing crumpled in a dream For a married woman: If a married woman sees in a dream that her husband is slaughtering a blessing, then this is evidence of the end of the problems and debts that this woman suffered from in the previous period. Interpretation of seeing a crumpled woman in a dream for a pregnant woman If a pregnant woman sees in her dream that she is talking to a crumpled woman, this is evidence of an easy and natural birth She will give birth to a male child who will be of great importance in the future. The highest and most knowledgeable. Interpretation of seeing a divorced woman collapse in a dream if she sees

title: Interpretation of seeing lightning in a dream for an unmarried woman according to the interpretation of Ibn Sirin and Al-Usaimi.

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing lightning in a dream for a single woman According to the interpretation of Ibn Sirin and Al-Usaimi, lightning is an annoying natural phenomenon that can cause serious damage and natural disasters, as lightning has caused many fires and deaths. A terrifying dream that is closer to the image that people see in reality. Many are searching for its interpretation, its relationship to their reality, and the reason for seeing it in a dream. In this article, we will learn together about the interpretation of seeing lightning in a dream for a single woman according to the interpretation of Ibn Sirin and Al-Usaimi. Interpretation of the dream of seeing lightning in a dream for a single woman. Interpretation by Ibn Sirin. The dream symbolizes the fear of God Almighty and the justice of the situation. It symbolizes the return of a dear person from the trip that brings happiness to her heart. The strong light in the sky caused by lightning and hearing her resonant voice symbolizes the approach of a happy event in her life that she has long desired. It may be work or marriage. Lightning in a dream for an unmarried woman has other indicators, which are her strong personality and her ability to endure life’s problems and difficult matters. Seeing Lightning without rain or thunder with anxiety and fear is a warning message about something or a decision that you accept and must reconsider. Interpretation of a dream about seeing lightning in a dream Al-Osaimi’s interpretation Lightning, when a woman sees it without rain, symbolizes fear, anxiety, and insecurity. This may indicate that she has been exposed to To threaten and threaten harm from an enemy or someone who wants to harm her. Lightning in a dream, when accompanied by rain, indicates achieving justice and victory over an unjust enemy. Interpretation of a dream about seeing thunder in a dream for a single woman, despite the prevailing belief that seeing a woman with thunder in a dream is a harbinger It is ominous and symbolizes the occurrence of a misfortune, but the vast majority of circumstances in which this dream appears portend good, which we will explain in detail in the following paragraph: Thunder laden with rain is a great joy that will enter her life and a harbinger that dreams will come true by God’s command. Hearing the sound of thunder while looking at the sky in The dream indicates the dreamer’s closeness to God Almighty and his willingness to disobey and commit sins. Hearing the sound of thunder without rain is a sign of anxiety and fear that an unmarried woman feels within herself. Lightning is one of the dreams that appear to people when they feel anxiety, fear, and psychological instability, and in this period there is Many events that disturb the viewer and make him have disturbing dreams.

title: Interpretation of begging in a dream, does it come true?

preview.html: In this article, we will look at the interpretation of supplication in a dream. Has her symbol recognition become a reality? In fact, supplication is one of the means that strengthens the relationship between the servant and his Lord. God urged us to do this, as God Almighty said in Surah Ghafir (And your Lord said, “Call upon Me, and I will answer you.” Seeing the dreamer in his dream invoking God has many different interpretations that you can find in an encyclopedia. Interpretation of begging in a dream, does it come true? There are many different interpretations associated with this. Vision. Ibn Sirin narrated that if a person dreams that he is calling to God Almighty, then this vision is good news that sorrows and worries will pass. If the dreamer sees that he is calling on God after prayer in a dream, then this dream heralds goodness and indicates the end of worries and problems in reality. In the event that he sees If the dreamer is begging someone he knows in a dream, then this vision is a sign of gossip. In the case of the dreamer’s traveler, the supplication in the dream indicates the return from the trip and the imminent departure. Prayer in the dream indicates the achievement of the goals that the dreamer seeks in the dream. Interpretation of a dream Supplication in a dream by Ibn Sirin: In the event that the dreamer is sick in reality, and he saw that he was begging in his dream, then this vision indicates that he will recover soon, and God knows best. Begging accompanied by screaming in a dream indicates that the dreamer is suffering from many problems and fears in reality. If someone sees In the dream, he is begging, but he does not know what to say in his supplication, so this vision warns him of the need to get closer to God, because this dream may indicate his prayer. Without reverence. Ibn Sirin also mentioned that if the dreamer sees in a dream a group of people gathering around him and praying for him, then this vision indicates salvation from the problems and worries that the dreamer suffers from in reality. Seeing supplication at night indicates the good condition of the dreamer and his commitment to obedience. Interpretation Praying for Nabulsi in a dream. Imam Nabulsi interpreted seeing supplication in a dream as one of the good dreams that portends the opening of the chest and the coming of relief to the dreamer, especially if the dreamer is crying and in a state of humility. One of the promising symbols of this vision is that it expresses the fulfillment of what the dreamer aspires to on the ground. If the dreamer dreams that he is calling on his Lord among many familiar people, this indicates an improvement in the dreamer’s psychological conditions. But if the dreamer shouts loudly as if he were screaming, this is an undesirable sign that expresses that the dreamer is going through a difficult period full of problems. When a girl sees someone who is not... A married woman herself prays to God in the rain, as this is a praiseworthy symbol for her that lies in changing her circumstances for the better and marrying a suitable young man. Al-Nabulsi stated that supplication in a dream expresses a lack of appreciation for the value of the blessings that God has given to the dreamer. A dream about praying for a married woman symbolizes a state of psychological stability. Which the dreamer enjoys in reality, and it is also good news for her that she will give birth soon. Interpretation of seeing supplication in a dream by Ibn Shaheen Ibn Shaheen mentioned that begging in a dream symbolizes facilitating the situation and achieving what the dreamer wants, so this vision expresses

title: Secrets of interpreting a soil tank in a dream for good and evil

preview.html: In the following article, we present to you, through the encyclopedia, the interpretation of an underground tank in a dream in all cases in which this dream can be seen, whether the dreamer is male, single, married, or pregnant. It is not a common dream that a dreamer can see in his sleep, but rather it is a dream that he does. It is not seen every day, which makes the dreamer wonder what meaning it may convey to him and whether it portends good or evil. We will explain to you in the following paragraphs the interpretation of seeing a water tank, whether it is empty or full, as narrated by glorious dream interpretation scholars such as the scholar Ibn Sirin, Imam Jaafar al-Sadiq, . - Al-Nabulsi and Ibn Shaheen, as well as when the tank is filled with water or oil, as it is known as a barrel in Arab societies. Interpretation of an underground tank in a dream. Below are the different interpretations of seeing a tank in a dream in general: Seeing a tank indicates that you are gaining something new in life that the dreamer did not have. Before, such as a new house or land, and it may also symbolize undertaking a business or investment project. The tank symbolizes some qualities that the dreamer may possess, such as the desire to possess other people's things and selfishness. A barrel that the dreamer looks into and finds a bright light from its rim is a sign of... The arrival of weddings and happy occasions. The black tank symbolizes commercial projects from which the dreamer earns money in reality, but this money will not make him feel happy. Seeing a green barrel is a pleasant dream that conveys good news and a pregnant woman, but it indicates that the dreamer is a good person who is quick to Doing goodness, piety, and justice. The blue tank indicates optimism and hope despite the afflicted person suffering from consequences, problems, and hardships. The tank is yellow in color, which indicates the presence of people in the dreamer’s life who harbor hatred and envy and wish to destroy everything he owns in the world of money and children. It could also be a bad omen indicating illness, God forbid. Interpretation of seeing an oil tank in a dream: The dreamer may see a tank of oil in his dream and it has different meanings that often depend on the color of the oil, which we will explain in the following paragraph: While an oil tank is considered an unpleasant vision Symbolizing pains and worries, it can also refer to forbidden money and sins committed by the dreamer, and it is a message calling on him to repent and return from the path he is on. The black oil barrel symbolizes the wars that will break out either in the dreamer’s city or in family and familial relationships. While the oil tank Broken suggests the disintegration of the family that the viewer is experiencing between him and his wife, children, or siblings. White oil in a dream is a sign of the presence of an immoral woman with bad behavior in the life of a man who is trying to steal him from his wife and family, or that it is a friend who the dreamer is trying to get close to. Which drags her down the path of deception, and whoever sees this dream should beware. Interpretation of a dream about a tank full of water In the following points we remind you of the interpretation of seeing a tank of water in a dream: According to Ibn Sirin, a tank of water in a dream indicates life, because it indicates the marriage of an unmarried person.
